channel.title: Any 1 know how to do a "Texte Expressif"? deperatly need help
channel.description: I have french class and I'm pretty good in french but I've been absent a lot and was wondering if some one could help me out with this. Does any one know the basic format/outline of "Un texte expressif"? It's a type of essay or writing format close to " Un Text du oppinion" but not the same thing. If any knows the format and how I should write it please let me know. Thanks a lot everybody I desperatly need this answer. Take care all. ~~~ Snow ~~~

item.title: Any 1 know how to do a "Texte Expressif"? deperatly need help
item.dc:creator: @dark_heart dark_heart
item.description:
@dark_heart wrote:

I have french class and I’m pretty good in french but I’ve been absent a lot and was wondering if some one could help me out with this. Does any one know the basic format/outline of “Un texte expressif”? It’s a type of essay or writing format close to " Un Text du oppinion" but not the same thing. If any knows the format and how I should write it please let me know. Thanks a lot everybody I desperatly need this answer. Take care all. ~~~ Snow ~~~
